test_cases.message: Class 'AccountProfile' uses 'Profile' instead of 'Account'
Class 'CustomerWallet' uses 'Wallet' instead of 'Account'
Class 'InvestmentPortfolio' uses 'Portfolio' instead of 'Account'
Variable 'account_record' uses 'Record' instead of 'Account'
Method 'process_operation' uses 'Operation' instead of 'Transaction'
Class 'MoneyTransfer' uses 'Transfer' instead of 'Transaction'
Class 'FundMovement' uses 'Movement' instead of 'Transaction'
Variable 'account_activity' uses 'Activity' instead of 'Transaction'
Class 'CreditApplication' uses 'Credit' instead of 'Loan'
Method 'calculate_debt' uses 'Debt' instead of 'Loan'
Class 'FinancingOffer' uses 'Financing' instead of 'Loan'
Class 'CashAdvance' uses 'Advance' instead of 'Loan'
Class 'PaymentMethodCard' uses 'PaymentMethod' instead of 'Card'
Class 'PaymentInstrument' uses 'Instrument' instead of 'Card'
Variable 'security_token' uses 'Token' instead of 'Card'
Class 'CardDevice' uses 'Device' instead of 'Card'
Class 'AccountManager' violates banned term 'Manager' - use AccountRepository instead
Class 'TransactionHelper' violates banned term 'Helper' - use domain-specific name
Class 'CurrencyUtil' violates banned term 'Util' - use CurrencyConverter
Class 'AccountData' violates banned term 'Data' - use Account entity
Class 'PaymentHandler' violates banned term 'Handler' - use PaymentProcessor
Class 'LoanManager' violates banned term 'Manager' - use LoanRepository
Class 'ValidationUtility' violates banned term 'Utility' - use specific validator name
Class 'TransactionService' violates banned term 'Service' - use specific service name
LoanManagement importing from CardServices violates context boundaries
Direct import from loan_management to card_services not allowed
CardServices.process_loan_payment() directly accessing LoanManagement
Cross-context call must go through AccountManagement context
TransactionInitiated event not published in initiate_transaction method
Missing TransactionAuthorized event after authorization check
LoanApplicationSubmitted event not triggered in submit_application
CardIssued event missing when Card entity is created
AccountStatus implemented as string instead of value object
Money class missing currency validation in value object
RepaymentSchedule should be immutable value object
CardType should be enum value object not plain string
Account entity missing unique account_number identifier
Transaction entity lacks transaction_id and timestamp fields
Loan entity missing loan_number and interest_rate attributes
Card entity requires card_number and expiration_date fields
Class name 'accountHolder' should be PascalCase 'AccountHolder'
Class name 'loanApplication' violates PascalCase naming convention
LoanApplication aggregate missing invariant enforcement for credit checks
CardTransaction should be part of Transaction aggregate root
TransactionProcessing context must depend on AccountManagement for balance verification
LoanManagement accessing Account without going through AccountManagement context
CardServices bypassing TransactionProcessing for payment operations
TransactionType should be enum value object with Deposit, Withdrawal values
AccountHolder entity needs personal_info and contact_info attributes
LoanDisbursed event not raised when disburse_funds method is called
